name: Arsu
greetingText: May your words shape the world!
wishText: On this special day, I wish you a year filled with inspiration, creativity, and endless stories waiting to be written. May your words touch hearts, your dreams turn into chapters, and your passion for writing take you to the bestseller lists you were destined for! May God shower you with blessings, guiding your journey with wisdom, joy, and boundless opportunities. May every blank page become a masterpiece, every idea turn into magic, and every step lead you closer to the world eagerly waiting for your words.
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday!!! Keep writing, keep dreaming, and keep believing!
text2: I wanted to do something especial.
replayText: Or click, if you want to see it again.
